Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authority of the county of Columbia to impose an additional real estate transfer tax
Summary: Extends the authority of the county of Columbia to impose an additional real estate transfer tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 556 of the laws of 2007 amending the tax law relating to the imposition of an additional real estate transfer tax within the county of Columbia, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
